docs.abstract: New hardware, including the $1,500 Surface Book, shows Microsoft is serious about adjusting to competition from the likes of Apple and Google.
docs.snippet: New hardware, including the $1,500 Surface Book, shows Microsoft is serious about adjusting to competition from the likes of Apple and Google.

headline.main: Daily Report: Microsoft Turns On the Hardware Charm

docs.abstract: Microsoft, which once had little interest in hardware, introduced on Tuesday a laptop, a tablet computer, smartphones and a wearable fitness band.
docs.snippet: Microsoft, which once had little interest in hardware, introduced on Tuesday a laptop, a tablet computer, smartphones and a wearable fitness band.
docs.lead_paragraph: Not long ago, Microsoft had little interest in being in the hardware business, aside from its Xbox game console, computer keyboards and mice. On Tuesday, though, the company packed an event in New York with all its latest devices.

headline.main: The Hardware Side of Microsoft Unveils a Pile of New Devices
headline.print_headline: Hardware Side of Microsoft Unveils New Consumer Devices
